model_id: Unique identifier for all the PDXs derived from the same tissue sample
host_strain_name: Host mouse strain name (e.g. NOD-SCID, NSG, etc)
host_strain_nomenclature: The full nomenclature form of the host mouse strain name.
engraftment_site: Organ or anatomical site used for the PDX tumour engraftment (e.g. mammary fat pad, Right flank)
engraftment_type: PDX Engraftment Type: Orthotopic if the tumour was engrafted at a corresponding anatomical  site (e.g. patient tumour of primary site breast was grafted in mouse mamary fat pad). If grafted subcuteanously use hererotopic
sample_type: Description of the type of  material grafted into the mouse. (e.g. tissue fragments, cell suspension)
sample_state: PDX Engraftment material state (e.g. fresh or frozen). If other please describe
passage_number: Passage number -  When different host strains, or PDX Engraftment Site or PDX Engraftment Type or PDX Engraftment Materia were used during the PDX line generation,  please add passage - add rows per model as needed.  We assume that passage 0 correspond to first engraftment - if not the case please indicate what passage 0 correspond to. passage number- add rows if columns D,E,F, G changes - if no change and always same D,E,F,G add 'all' as passage value to specify the conditions are the same in all passages.
parent_id: Please add the model Id of the model used to generate the model. If the model was not in this set, please refer to it by external id
origin_patient_sample_id: Unique ID of the patient tumour sample used to generate the model
publications: If model has been part of a published study include pubmed IDs separated by commas.
supplier: Please provide the supliers brief acronym or name followed by a colon and the number or name use to reference the model
supplier_type: Model supplier type - commercial, academic, other
catalog_number: Catalogue number of model, if commercial
vendor_link: Link to purchasable model, if commercial
external_ids: Depmap accession, Cellusaurus accession or other id. Please place in comma separated list

host_strain_nomenclature: Use most precise nomenclature when possible. Omit html tags (e.g. <sup>). For nomenclature reference ctrl-click here.
engraftment_site: use anatomical graft site, not collected, or not provided
engraftment_type: heterotopic, orthotopic, not collected, or not provided.
sample_type: free text, not collected or not provided
sample_state: free text , not collected or not provided
supplier: free text, not collected or not provided
